website_summaries.verdict: An iPad stand that offers tremendous strength and durability.
pros: Includes a 360° base, bracket holder and folding arm to offer maximum flexibility
One-button functionality ensures you can instantly attach or detach your iPad from the stand
Weighted base helps keep your iPad in place
Can be used with both Apple and Android devices

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for us. My husband and I do trade shows. We started using an I-Pad to process payments. This is perfect. It rotates left/right and back/forward. I do put my hand on the back of the I-Pad when customers are signing for their credit card transactions, just because. Really no reason, I just do it. Some people press very hard when they write, and I just don't want to take a chance of it falling backwards. You can put the I-pad vertical or horizontal. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy McNemar

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: This is in the rank for best purchase I have made on the ZON all year! I love this stand for my ipad mini! Also fit my iPad and iPhones. It swivels and the parts that hold the divines also turn for different direction (vertical or horizontal) uses. Very durable and extremely sturdy! Did I mention I LOVE this product!!!!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shawntam

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand to hold my iPad at Fairs and Markets so I can easily access the Square app for purchases. This stand is very sturdy and the base weighs enough so that it does not get knocked over. I have read the other reviews about the holder having some play in it, but this has not been the case for me. I did have to take my iPad out of the case it was in because the case made the iPad too thick and I could lock it in. All in all I would highly recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary about buying this product not knowing if the base strong. I didnt want a plastic lightweight product to hold my ipad. This is not that. It's made really well. The bottom base has a heavy weight to it to keep it from tipping over when using it and it also holds the ipad strongly in place. I couldn't have asked for anything better. I also love the white color. It's not off white nor bright white, its sort of a cloud white which makes it staying clean, easy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ortega

customer_reviews.title: quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand. Started with my iphone, went to a small tablet then to my larger tablet. I will be using this in a retail situation and wanted to be able to swivel it around for customer to sign. This will make things so much easier. Attached my Square and will be ready to go. Base is a good weight and neck and clamps very sturdy..no bouncing when using. Just received this and I think it will work out very well. Good price and fast delivery. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: CLAY LADY

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend it for high use
customer_reviews.text: flimsy and only swings in one direction. Don't recommend it for high use. ***** Update - The seller contacted me after seeing my one star rating of the product. He offered to reverse the charges which I highly appreciated. Plus offered to replace the unit. Seems like good business practice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Talavera

customer_reviews.title: Great product for home and office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kiosk iPad stand to use in the home as we were turning an old iPad into a family calendar/message center. The I liked that the stand came with two different sized claps used to hold the iPad in place. After about a month of use, the Gen 1 iPad was replaced with an iPad Mini. It was so easy to replace the claps holder on the stand. With the kids handling the unit, we have not had to worry about the entire unit toppling over. Great quality product and extremely versatile.
customer_reviews.author: The Infochick

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t sure if they would work, yea they do.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy stand. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sturdiness of the stand spring loaded bracket that holds the iPad and the stand. One thing I don’t like is the the swivel feature is a bit sticky going one way but smooth the other way. It would be nice if it was smooth both ways.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great

It is very sturdy and hold my iPad Pro perfectly. Live that it is very versatile on the angles you can move it to. Will definitely buy again if I ever need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Connie O

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can't believe I waited so long to get one. Beats having to hold it or deal with floppy stands that just dont work. Love the grip on the bottom that holds it securely in place. Keeps the pad more comfortably at eye level. Recommend this for anyone with a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: BOGART

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Used daily for a year. I never had an issue with this product. The only negative is it spins one direction - not really an issue but my kiddo forced it to spin the wrong direction and broke it. I'm purchasing another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made stand and well thought out. It fits the iPad pro 12.9 inch model perfectly. Assembles in under a minute and it secures the iPad making it easy to rotate from landscape to portrait position along with the ability to tilt and swivel the iPad to the position you need. I have started to use my iPad more as my everyday computer and this stand makes it comfortable to use for long hours. My only regret is not buying this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: DanC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 months before falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I have a nearly identical stand that I used for my previous iPad, made by AIDATA, and I have had it for 2 or 3 years. I bought the iPad Pro which is too large for the stand that I already had, so I bought this one. I haven't had it for 2 months, and it is about to break--the piece that allows you to rotate/change orientation of the tablet has become incredibly loose and based on the other reviews of people that have had this same issue (that I only just now read) it is most likely about to break, and I no longer trust it to hold my iPad. Thoroughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: New Business Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited about this tablet holder purchase! These will work perfect to hold my business iPads (I purchased two). I didn't want to have to start with the square system holders right off due to the expense. These were easy to put together, however there wasn't any instructions but common sense should do it! If I decide to upgrade to larger iPads, I can still use these holders. I love the fact they twist and tilt, which is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: ... for my new iPad & I couldn't be more pleased. I holds my 12
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st stand for my new iPad & I couldn't be more pleased. I holds my 12.9" perfectly when protected just with shell case. Although a thicker case poses a problem (if too thick, stand brackets can't grasp the iPad edges properly), this item has great stability and holds securely. It also has great viewing angles and rotates for multiple viewing angles and perspectives. I'm very pleased that I can place iPad in the stand and watch TV / movies from other side of the room with no difficulty. I would buy again -- if I needed another!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy D

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT BUT BROKE TO $@ AT 30 DAYS.

It cracked all to hell and broke off at the base, screw came out, no way to even fix it. Completely broke POS. I never dropped it, it was wonderful for an entire 30 days then bam, fell apart. So annoyed.

customer_reviews.title: nice stand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! We use this as our square stand on ...

The only thing to keep in mind is the placement of the clamps to your charging port. The clamp ended up right over top of the charging port so our is actually seated of center so we can plug in our tablets's power cord.

customer_reviews.title: Simple Design, Great Versatility!
customer_reviews.text: The stand is a little shorter than we expected, but it works very well with our iPad's protective case installed. We placed the stand on an elevated surface and it is at the perfect height for typing. Also, we are able to wrap our security cable through the opening of the riser, and it all works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand! Perfect for watching shows or as a stand while making a recipe.

I have used it to watch shows while baking, as a stand for my recipe app, as a stand while typing docomentsbfor work on my Bluetooth keyboard and as a stand for my Partybooth app. which was a huge hit! I have gotten many compliments on this stand.

customer_reviews.title: It was great for two months but then 👎
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my iPad that I was using to check customers out at my boutique. My boutique opened on May 4th. Two days ago it started feeling loose. Wouldn’t hold the iPad straight. Today I turned it for a customer to sign their CC transaction and it falls apart. Fail. I expected it to last longer than two months.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Helm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Live this sturdy little stands. It's perfect to use for accepting square payments or to hold iOS while recording demos, FB Live videos or tutorials. It swivels, turns and is weighted enough to feel comfortable leaving it on a table and not worrying about your iPad being knocked over. It holds my iPad 9.7 screen perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: StephRenae2508

customer_reviews.title: It's All About the Base
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy base where my child can button mash the screen without it tilting over with the ability for a 90 degree angle so the camera wasn't point at the top of his head or ceiling. I came across rotating stand and it does the trick. The base is extremely sturdy and won't fall backwards/tilt when the screen is pushed by kids that don't understand the word "GENTLE". This is able to turn vertical and horizontal, by simply just rotating the tablet. As you can see from the photos it's a nice fit for even the 12.9 iPad Pro. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: G. Ku

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Can keep it sitting on our kitchen counter all the time to talk with Siri about the weather or whatever. Then it is hand.to to use to watch Netflix. Easy snap out to put it inside its cover to take somewhere. Glad that a friend recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Light and Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Great value stand
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. The product is great - very stable. I had one question and customer service was very responsive. A great value. Not an ideal fit for the Fire 8 (2017) in the horizonal position - hard to avoid the buttons - but we made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Nauticow

customer_reviews.title: The stand is definitely sturdy and grips my iPad Air well
customer_reviews.text: Received the stand today – a quick review. The stand is definitely sturdy and grips my iPad Air well. It’s not going to slip off. It also does as stated – rotates 360 degrees and has adjustable angles. Two things I didn’t know. First – it only rotates clockwise, not counter clockwise. Not a deal breaker but you’ll need to adjust you cable connections according. Second – while the iPad is secured within the bracket holder, there is some ‘play’. It’ll rock to the left and right. Again, not a deal breaker but just thought I’d mention it. Over all, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made stand
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, it's sturdy, no worry about my ipad falling out, or the unit tipping over. I just pick up the whole stand by the vertical part and carry it from room to room. It rotates the ipad clockwise, but I can't rotate it counter-clockwise to the position it was in to start with. That sounds minor, but it is annoying to have to go all the way around when I just want to go back one click--especially when I have the ipad plugged in. And that happens a lot. BUT...when it's vertical it stays solidly vertical, when it's horizontal it stays horizontal--no wobbles. I never use my ipad cover anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Check immediately for flaws - see other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Received item. No instructions & screw to hold together fails to do so. Am requesting replacement but after reading reviews here about it falling apart so easy and fast, am not optimistic about quality as many reviews state it falls apart. Needs a washer. CAUTION.
customer_reviews.author: Sarassheena

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I have made for my small side business
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made for my small side business. It can be separated into two pieces, which makes it compact and easy to store/transport. It is sturdy and can be tilted to different heights. It fits my old Ipad but can be used for various size tablets. It can be turned vertically or horizontally. It makes my checkout process professional and convenient for customers. You can see it in the back right corner of the photo, setup for one of my shows!
customer_reviews.author: CRoss

customer_reviews.title: Using for POS
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in my store for POS transactions. I love that it comes with two different heads so it should really fit with almost any tablet. I have a I pad mini and a I pad and its great! I love that the base is heavy enough to allow you to just swivel if you need a signature or while you enter the transaction. This is also cheaper then any stand the POS co would offer. Great option at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: CCOTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Really good value!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for on-site usage with an ipad so our guests can sign our electronic waiver. It has been surprisingly sturdy and easy to set up. We travel to our event sites and it gets packed and unpacked assembled in a storage tote. It had survived this season VERY well and has never fallen over, slipped off a table, or broken. I think I may buy a couple more as we expand our event registration towards paperless.
customer_reviews.author: skrause

customer_reviews.title: Worked Very Well for Our Conference
customer_reviews.text: We used these stands as part of a conference we host. We used them at the check-in desk and they worked really well for swiveling between myself and the attendee. However, the top piece where you would rotate the iPad only works in a clockwise position so sometimes it took a few extra rotations to get the iPad in the correct direction again. It was easy to assemble and was sturdy during 3 and a half days of use. I really liked how it came with two different sized tops to fit a variety of devices in different ways.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna S

customer_reviews.title: An awesome way to make a tablet into a point of sale terminal
customer_reviews.text: This device is a great design except for the limitations of tablet sizes it will hold. It rotates, tips and swivels. I use it to hold a 10" tablet for point of sale transactions, and can simply flip the tablet over for the customer to sign. Well worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Holds My tablet securely
customer_reviews.text: Needed a secure tablet Stand in my TV Control room. The Clamp is secure enough to hold an 8 inch tablet with multiple cables attached. Bonus, It comes with two size clamps and is easy to install. The only downside is that it spins a little to easily. But if you are looking for a unit that rotates easily, then this is the unit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lleland Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Not Really for Business
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay stand but not really good for a business to use. Once the ipad is in; its very shaky and unstable. The ipad slips around so you are constantly centering it again. Also there is not lock. Our ipad was stolen 4 days after buying this stand. In hindsight I sure wish I had bought a locking stand. This stand is more geared to home use.
customer_reviews.author: kayscrochet

customer_reviews.title: Easy for adult to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The footprint of this product is quite small. It holds on to the tablet securely. I love that it can be rotated 360 degrees, tilt it at a certain angle. Though easy for adults to adjust the angle, my child needed more help as he tipped it multiple times trying to adjust it during his zoom class.
customer_reviews.author: SewCakeNPretty

customer_reviews.title: Good "in place" holder, not ment for extended reach movement.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't research this product well enough. While the tablet is on the chairside table, I was expecting to get easier access to the screen while sitting in my recliner. Not so. I still have to reach far. This device only elevates tablet about 4 inches, swivels 360°, and tilts back, While base is in place on the table. I guess I need a long arm adjustable tablet holder.
customer_reviews.author: david m.

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet stand ever!!

customer_reviews.title: Liked it for a month....

Pretty expensive for molded plastic for it to break under normal use just from the pressure of holding an ipad in place.

customer_reviews.title: Great for On-Line Meetings

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality

customer_reviews.title: The stand works pretty well. It's nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The stand works pretty well. It's nice and sturdy, however, our tablet just fits without having to extend the part that holds the tablet. The only way for it to hold our tablet is horizontally and then it's a little bit loose. Since the volumne and power buttons are on the top edge of the tablet in this position, it wiggles a little when you're trying to push on them. If we put it in vertically the tablet slides to the bottom of the stand. Wish it was just a little smaller.

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy stand for Tablets

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy for business

customer_reviews.title: Ipad 11 pro pencil charging issue with this sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: I used the bigger frame to hold my ipad 11 pro but i need to charge my apple pencil for that i have to remove ipad from this frame bcz i can put this frame vertically its not stretched tht much.i did not realize when i bought this.its. Very sturdy No doubt.

customer_reviews.title: I Pad Holder

customer_reviews.title: Received a preowned stand

I opened the box and removed the stand parts , in bags that were torn open and the tape was mangled and not sticking to the bag. I then looked at all of the pieces and determined they were OK. I think Amazon should have sold this product as pre-owned and not as new. Tisk, Tisk I hope I don't have any problems when I try To use it. I'll keep you informed

customer_reviews.title: Functional and easy to use
